articles.title: Rand Paul slams Lindsey Graham's comments: That's a low, gutter-type response - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Rand Paul rebuffs fellow Republican Sen. Lindsey Graham's response to Paul's criticism of a classified Iran briefing.

articles.author: Brian Fung, CNN Business
articles.title: Hacking attempts originating in Iran nearly triple following Soleimani strike, researchers say
articles.description: Hackers looking to breach US computer networks sharply intensified their efforts following the death of Iranian military leader Qasem Soleimani, but have had limited success, according to internet security researchers and state government officials.
articles.content: Washington, DC (CNN Business)Hackers looking to breach US computer networks sharply intensified their efforts following the death of Iranian military leader Qasem Soleimani, but have had limited success, according to internet security researchers and state go… [+3807 chars]

articles.author: Pamela Brown, Barbara Starr, Zachary Cohen and Jim Acosta, CNN
articles.title: Standing down: How Trump decided that not striking back was his best option on Iran
articles.description: America's top diplomat on Iran was only a few minutes into a speech on Tuesday afternoon when he was handed an urgent note.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)America's top diplomat on Iran was only a few minutes into a speech on Tuesday afternoon when he was handed an urgent note.

articles.title: Sen. Lee on Iran briefing: Worst briefing I've seen on a military issue - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Mike Lee (R-UT) rails against a classified briefing on Iran, calling it "the worst briefing I've seen, at least on a military issue."

articles.title: Top US general says Iran tried to kill US troops as some administration officials believe they purposely missed

articles.author: Kareem Khadder
articles.title: Two rockets land in Baghdad's heavily fortified Green Zone
articles.description: Two rockets landed inside the heavily fortified Green Zone in Baghdad, home of the US Embassy in Iraq, on Wednesday afternoon, according to the Iraqi military.
articles.content:
(CNN)Two rockets landed inside the heavily fortified Green Zone in Baghdad, home of the US Embassy in Iraq, on Wednesday afternoon, according to the Iraqi military.
The Iraqi joint military command told CNN in Baghdad that "two Katyusha rockets landed inside… [+241 chars]

articles.title: Former DNI James Clapper on Iran: There's been too much 'chest-beating' - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper tells CNN's Brooke Baldwin that Iran could have done more damage with their missile strikes, but he thinks that they wanted to convey a message of restraint.

articles.author: Pamela Brown, CNN
articles.title: Iran sent 'multiple messages' to US that its attacks were done
articles.description: As US officials were busy assessing Iran's missile attacks in Iraq late Tuesday, messages began arriving from Iran saying one thing: We're done.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)As US officials were busy assessing Iran's missile attacks in Iraq late Tuesday, messages began arriving from Iran saying one thing: We're done.
There were "multiple messages and they were all the same," a person familiar with the matter said… [+690 chars]

articles.author: Catherine E. Shoichet, CNN
articles.title: This is what Iranian Americans think will happen next
articles.description: Some Iranian Americans, stunned by the US's killing of Qasem Suleimani and the Iranian regime's response, say they're afraid for what's to come -- and what they already see happening. Others say they feel hopeful.
articles.content:
Hey, everyone. Los Angeles Iranian hereI will be sure to report any Iranians engaging in suspicious activity like obeying parking signs, turning down free kabob, and driving sensible sedans.
— Nazanin Nour (@NazaninNour) January 3, 2020
